applicant-name.name: ZHONGSHAN YIDINGJIE NANO TECH CO LTD
中山市亿鼎杰纳米科技有限公司

invention-title: Reaction equipment for producing hydrogen from residual oil and method for reducing emission and carbon by utilizing reaction equipment
一种渣油制氢的反应设备及利用该设备减排降碳的方法

abstract.p: The invention relates to the technical field of residual oil hydrogen production, and provides reaction equipment for residual oil hydrogen production and a method for reducing emission and carbon by using the equipment, and the equipment comprises a feeding unit, a raw material pretreatment unit, a steam reforming reactor, a medium change reactor, a low change reactor, a CO2 recovery device and a liquid ammonia cooling device which are communicated in sequence; the feeding unit comprises a liquid storage tank for storing water and an oil storage tank for storing residual oil; the raw material pretreatment unit comprises a water vaporizing chamber communicated with the liquid storage tank and a residual oil preheater communicated with the oil storage tank, and the water vaporizing chamber and the residual oil preheater are communicated with the steam reforming reactor; the steam reforming reactor, the medium-temperature change reactor and the low-temperature change reactor are all internally provided with a membrane device for catalytic reaction, the membrane device is cylindrical, and the height of the membrane device is 50-120mm. The residual oil hydrogen production reaction equipment realizes'instant production and instant use 'of hydrogen, and is combined with a fuel cell or a hydrogen internal combustion engine, so that the energy consumption and the cost can be effectively reduced, and the problems of hydrogen energy storage, transportation, filling and safety are reduced.

本发明涉及渣油制氢技术领域，提供了一种渣油制氢的反应设备及利用该设备减排降碳的方法，其设备包括依次连通的供料单元、原料预处理单元、蒸汽重整反应器、中变反应器、低变反应器、CO2回收装置以及液氨冷却装置；供料单元包括用于存储水的储液罐以及用于存储渣油的储油罐；原料预处理单元包括与储液罐连通的水气化室以及与储油罐连通的渣油预热器，水气化室以及渣油预热器与蒸汽重整反应器连通；蒸汽重整反应器、中变反应器以及低变反应器内均设有用于催化反应的膜片装置，膜片装置呈圆柱状，膜片装置高为50～120mm。通过渣油制氢反应设备实现氢气的“即产即用”，与燃料电池或氢内燃机相结合，能够有效降低能耗及成本，减少氢能储存、运输、加注及安全的问题。
